akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 94–455, title XIX, § 1901(a)(139), Oct. 4, 1976, 90 Stat. 1787]

akn:content.akn:p:
[§ 1240. Repealed. Pub. L. 94–455, title XIX, § 1901(a)(139), Oct. 4, 1976, 90 Stat. 1787]
Section, act Aug. 16, 1954, ch. 736, 68A Stat. 332, related to taxability to employee of termination payments.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal applicable with respect to taxable years beginning after Dec. 31, 1976, see section 1901(d) of Pub. L. 94–455, set out as an Effective Date of 1976 Amendment note under section 2 of this title.
